item.description:
Coming soon! ....give or take a month ;-)


"The Hobbit is an upcoming two-part epic fantasy-adventure film directed and produced by Peter Jackson and based on J. R. R. Tolkien's fantasy novel of the same name. The films will act as a prequel to Jackson's The Lord of the Rings film trilogy and will star Martin Freeman as Bilbo Baggins,[2]Richard Armitage as Thorin Oakenshield, and Benedict Cumberbatch as Smaug,[3] as well as several actors who will reprise their roles from The Lord of the Rings, including Ian McKellen, Andy Serkis, Hugo Weaving, Cate Blanchett, Christopher Lee, Ian Holm, Elijah Wood and Orlando Bloom.       [description from Wikipedia]"
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby by 2:30. Show time 3pm
item.name: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
